title: HYPNOTIC INDUCTION exercises/ Non-verbal hypnosis
description:
These images are from Dr. Marco Paret's non-verbal hypnosis masterclass. His student's are practicing hypnotic induction, using the powerful techniques that they learned from Dr. Paret in his school. They started with magnetic passes and the subject entered in a deep state. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
